nodes.text: The Master Qui-Gon Jinn had his private quarters at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. Although small and simple, as all Jedi residences were, Jinn's room nonetheless reflected its inhabitant's personality through a collection of mementos the Jedi had picked up on the various worlds he visited. Such mementos included a bit of driftwood, a soft woven blanket, a set of Gatalentan wind chimes, meditation stones from Ryloth, and a jade-green tea set that had been given to Jinn by a Bivall whom he had helped rescue their stranded starship.
